name: The Ascension
description: I painted 'The Ascension' in 2019, at a point in my life where I felt pretty low. Life wasn't going to plan. I had very little time to create, and had no particular goals!  Nevertheless, I stayed positive. I continued to create and set myself new goals.  3 years later, things have started to look up!  In times of low you must strive to stay positive! I've learnt that you must first descend before you can truly ascend.  3508 × 4961px 300DPI
